Group.Heading1: Click the green thing to update the value

Contents.Paragraph: Not sure what the WriteBinding-Attribute for CustomInputElement#onValueChanged and #onNumChanged does.

Anyway, we`ve got a reference object `MyVal` and a simple float `num` bound to a custom input element. Additionally we`ve set up an event handler for changes to `num` `CustomOnNumChange`. Changing `MyVal` and `num` from outside of the custom input works by clicking on the green area. You`ll see that the values change.
Drag the yellow area to trigger value changes from within the custom input.
